scripts.build:gh: USE_GH_BASE=true NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL=https://techkingishere.github.io/youralgowebsite next build --turbopack && rm -rf docs && mkdir -p docs && cp -R out/* docs/ && cp -f .nojekyll docs/.nojekyll
scripts.build:domain: USE_GH_BASE=false NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL=https://youralgo.tech next build --turbopack && rm -rf docs && mkdir -p docs && cp -R out/* docs/ && cp -f .nojekyll docs/.nojekyll && cp -f CNAME docs/CNAME
